allow: Bash(./supabase gen types typescript --project-id wykvpctrsqhebqpjmvdb --schema public)

Bash(DEV_DB=$DATABASE_URL psql $DEV_DB -c "SELECT sponsor_wallet_address, member_wallet_address FROM referrals WHERE sponsor_wallet_address NOT LIKE ''0x%'' OR member_wallet_address NOT LIKE ''0x%'';")

Bash(DEV_DB=$DATABASE_URL psql $DEV_DB -c "SELECT root_wallet, member_wallet, placer_wallet, parent_wallet FROM referrals WHERE root_wallet NOT LIKE ''0x%'' OR member_wallet NOT LIKE ''0x%'' OR placer_wallet NOT LIKE ''0x%'' OR (parent_wallet IS NOT NULL AND parent_wallet NOT LIKE ''0x%'');")

Bash(DEV_DB=$DATABASE_URL psql $DEV_DB -c "
-- Update referrals table with real wallet addresses based on production data
-- admin -> 0x380fd6a57fc2df6f10b8920002e4acc7d57d61c0
-- laurent153 -> 0xe6fb55d860c72f5e42056244410f5ea46895bfd8
-- laurent1532 -> 0xb79d58df8ea073dd3904bc804df1e187a0ae4821
-- admin123 (use for admin12345678) -> 0x6366573ff5f6b07be1e96b024c8862f5502d13e3
-- admin12345 -> 0x2bc46f768384f88b3d3c53de6a69b3718026d23f
-- laurent153889 -> 0xf9e54564d273531f97f95291baf0c3d74f337937
-- Test001 (use for laurent153889test) -> 0x9b132b74a6246fa90e9c36e5cd845f1ded10c589

UPDATE referrals SET 
  member_wallet = CASE 
    WHEN member_wallet = ''laurent153'' THEN ''0xe6fb55d860c72f5e42056244410f5ea46895bfd8''
    WHEN member_wallet = ''admin12345678'' THEN ''0x6366573ff5f6b07be1e96b024c8862f5502d13e3''
    WHEN member_wallet = ''laurent153889'' THEN ''0xf9e54564d273531f97f95291baf0c3d74f337937''
    WHEN member_wallet = ''laurent1532'' THEN ''0xb79d58df8ea073dd3904bc804df1e187a0ae4821''
    WHEN member_wallet = ''admin12345'' THEN ''0x2bc46f768384f88b3d3c53de6a69b3718026d23f''
    WHEN member_wallet = ''laurent153889test'' THEN ''0x9b132b74a6246fa90e9c36e5cd845f1ded10c589''
    ELSE member_wallet 
  END,
  placer_wallet = CASE 
    WHEN placer_wallet = ''admin'' THEN ''0x380fd6a57fc2df6f10b8920002e4acc7d57d61c0''
    WHEN placer_wallet = ''laurent153'' THEN ''0xe6fb55d860c72f5e42056244410f5ea46895bfd8''
    ELSE placer_wallet 
  END,
  parent_wallet = CASE 
    WHEN parent_wallet = ''admin'' THEN ''0x380fd6a57fc2df6f10b8920002e4acc7d57d61c0''
    WHEN parent_wallet = ''laurent153'' THEN ''0xe6fb55d860c72f5e42056244410f5ea46895bfd8''
    ELSE parent_wallet 
  END
WHERE 
  member_wallet NOT LIKE ''0x%'' OR 
  placer_wallet NOT LIKE ''0x%'' OR 
  (parent_wallet IS NOT NULL AND parent_wallet NOT LIKE ''0x%'');
")
Bash(DEV_DB=$DATABASE_URL psql $DEV_DB -c "SELECT root_wallet, member_wallet, placer_wallet, parent_wallet, layer, position FROM referrals ORDER BY layer, position;")
